title: STAT+: Top HHS official evades discussing Trump plan to block state AI laws
description: Deputy health secretary Jim O’Neill demurred when asked about a proposal to prevent states from enforcing local AI laws.
content: Deputy health secretary Jim O’Neill demurred when asked about a proposal to prevent states from enforcing local AI laws.
